description:
Told ruins to take on the trials written in the grimoire.
Hiita charges through the challenges with her impressive spiritual force, but she struggles when faced with a trial requiring balancing of powers on a spiritual scale.
With guidance and support from her friends, Hiita comes to realize that raw power isn`t everything, and begins to learn the delicate art of controlling her spiritual force...
Source: Official English Website

titles.title: Seireijutsu no Tsukaite II "Karei Tsukai Hiita"
Spirit Charmers II: "Hiita the Fire Charmer"
精霊術の使い手II「火霊使いヒータ」
